snippet: By default, the Mac OS X Dock-- the taskbar-like strip of program and folder shortcuts -- sits along the bottom edge of the screen. But you do not have to keep it there.
abstract: By default, the Mac OS X Dock-- the taskbar-like strip of program and folder shortcuts -- sits along the bottom edge of the screen. But you do not have to keep it there.

headline.print_headline: Repositioning the Dock on the Mac
